title: Prayer Habits
verses: Matthew 6:6 (WEB) — “Your Father who sees in secret will reward you.”
Colossians 4:2 (WEB) — “Continue steadfastly in prayer… with thanksgiving.”
body: Make prayer a simple rhythm: pause, praise, petition, and present yourself to God. Tie prayer to daily habits—meals, commute, bedtime—and keep it honest.
prayer: Father, teach me to pray. Fill my days with Your presence. Give me a listening heart and persevering faith in prayer. Amen.
